name: Total loss motor vehicle claims
text: §431:10C-309  Total loss motor vehicle claims.  When a motor vehicle insurance policy provides for the adjustment and settlement of an insured's motor vehicle's total losses on the basis of actual cash value or replacement, the insurer shall follow either the replacement method set forth in section 431:10C-310 or the cash settlement method set forth in section 431:10C-311. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1997, c 251, §47]
